about_the_game:
Zombie Dolls is a twin-stick shooter survival game with rogue-like elements. Defend your neighborhood against an invasion of cute zombiefied alien dolls using guns, bombs, and melee weapons.

Choose from a powerful selection of upgrades and special skills to enhance and develop your character. The game can be played as a traditional twin-stick shooter or as an auto-shooter for a more relaxed play style.

Demo Content

  • 2 arenas

  • 2 player local co-op

  • 8 unique dolls

  • 5 pick-ups/power-ups

SUPPORT US

Zombie Dolls is still in development. If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to post on the forum or send us an email.

If you want to support us you can do so by wishlisting the game, which we would really appreciate!

Choose from a powerful selection of upgrades and special skills to enhance and develop your character. The game can be played as a traditional twin-stick shooter or as an auto-shooter for a more relaxed play style.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2022
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Zombie Dolls Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fend off hordes of zombified dolls in this light-hearted, but intense, stand your ground shoot em up game. Don't be fooled by their friendly appearance, they are tough and unrelenting!
